channel.title: Architect on VGALTES blog
channel.description: Recent content in Architect on VGALTES blog

item.title: The architect
item.description: Last Wednesday was my last day in the project I worked on the last six months. I've spent a great time working there, learning a lot of things and improving as a professional. One of the members of the team, Mark, has the role of technical architect. If you have an agile mindset when you listen the word architect is not unusual that a look of disgust appears on your face.
